{"name": "ETHOS Nutrition Department", "alternate_name": "", "description": "To be eligible for this service, you must be:
Residing within the city of Boston
At least 60 years of age
Either temporarily or permanently homebound.
Based on their individual needs, elders may also receive frozen weekend meals, cold meals, and nutritional supplements.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/services/nutrition/meals-on-wheels/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "555 Amory Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Jamaica Plain", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02130", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3085932, "longitude": -71.1079942}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 477-6606", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required by phone"}]}
